species.name: Bothans
species.SpecialAbility: Bothans begin the game with one rank in Streetwise. Also start with one rank in convincing Demeanor talent

species.name: Droids
species.SpecialAbility: Droids do not need to eat sleep or breathe and are unaffected by toxins and poisons. Droids have a cybernetic implant cap of 6 instead of their brawn rating. After selecting career a droid PC may train 6 of the 8 career skills. After choosing specialization may train 3 of 4 specialization skills. Inorgainic uses emergency repair kits instead of stims. Driods cannot become force users or acquire force ratings.

species.name: Gands
species.SpecialAbility: Gands Begin the game with one rank in discipline. 2 sub species of gands lungs and lung-less. Lung less gain Ammonia respirator and treat oxygen has harmful atomsphere but gain 10xp

species.name: Humans
species.SpecialAbility: Humans start the game with 2 differnet non-career skills of thier choice

species.name: Rodians
species.SpecialAbility: Rodians begin with 1 rank of Survival and start with Expert Tracker talent.

species.name: Trandoshans
species.SpecialAbility: Trandoshans begin with 1 rank of Preception, Regeneration:Whenever would recover wounds from natural rest of bacta tank recover an additonal wound. Does not recover from medical treatments or stims. Trandoshans can regrow limbs although takes a month before even usable. Claws: When making brawl checks deals +1 damage and has crit of 3.

species.name: Twi'Leks
species.SpecialAbility: Twl'leks start with 1 rank in either charm or deception. Can remove setbacks imposed due to hot or arid conditions.

species.name: Wookies
species.SpecialAbility: Wookies begin the game with 1 rank in brawl. Wookie Rage: When suffered any wounds deal +1 damage on brawl or melee attacks, +2 if critically injured

species.name: Besalisk
species.SpecialAbility: Besalisk begin the game with 1 rank of Resilience. Besalisks have multiple sets of arms. As a result they gain an additional free maneuver per turn, though still may not perform more than 2 maneuvers.

species.name: Dug
species.SpecialAbility: Dugs begin the game with one rank in Brawl. Begin the game with Defensive Driving Talent

species.name: Mustafarian
species.SpecialAbility: Northern Mustafarian: Remove 2 setbacks from checks to resist arid or hot enviromental conditions. Gain one rank in the Eye for Detail talent. Sourthern Mustafarian: remove 2 setbacks for arid or hot enviromental conditions. Gain Enduring talent.

species.name: Aqualish
species.SpecialAbility: Aqualish can breathe underwater and gain one rank of Brawl additionally gain one for sub-species Aquala: Begin with 1 rank in Resilience, remove a setback due to cold or wet conditions. Ualaq: begin with 1 rank of Survival or Perception. May remove 1 setback due to dark conditions but gain 1 setback for bright condtions. Quara: gain 1 rank in athletics or Coercion. May remove setback when attempting to track anything through a natural enviroment

species.name: Klatooinian
species.SpecialAbility: Klatooinians begin with either brawl or Ranged(heavy) or Ranged(light). Start 1 rank of one non-career skill.

species.name: Weequay
species.SpecialAbility: Weequay begin with Resilience or Athletics, Weequay can communicate with other Weequays using pheromones. This is completely non-verbal, an undetectable to any other species nearby. Only can communicate in short range.

species.name: Hutts
species.SpecialAbility: Hutts begin the game with 1 rank in Enduring Talent and one rank of Nobody's Fool talents. Hutts begin game with one rank of Coercion or Discipline. Ponderous: A hutt can never spend more than 1 maneuver moving per turn.

species.name: Ganks
species.SpecialAbility: Ganks begin the game with 1 rank in Coercion or Vigilance. Cyborg: All Ganks are cyborgs. A Gank begins play with up to 2 cybernetics that a total of up to 5,000 credits. Ganks have an implant cap of 3 plus brawn.

species.name: Niktos
species.SpecialAbility: Red: 1 rank of Resilence may remove setback due to hot or arid conditions. Green Niktos: 1 rank of Coodination. Gain bosot die to athletics chcks to climb trees and other surfaces their claws can pentrate, Claws: +1 damage and crit rating of 3. Mountain: gain 1 rank of Survival. Gain Natural Outdoorsman talent. Pale: Gain 1 rank of Athletics, Swimmer: never suffers movement penalties fro traveling through water and can hold breath for number of rounds twice hie brawn rating. Southern: 1 rank of perception and gain boost to perception and vigilance checks to deteck sounds.

species.name: Sakiyans
species.SpecialAbility: Begin with 1 rank in Perception or Vigilance. Also start with 1 rank of expert tracker.

species.name: Falleen
species.SpecialAbility: begin with 1 rank of Charm. Beguiling Pheromones: can suffer 2 strain to upgrade ability of Charm, Deception or Negotiation check against sentient being in short range.

species.name: Gotal
species.SpecialAbility: Start with 1 rank in perception. Energy Sensitivity: Once per encounter as a manuever may sense the presence and current emotional states of all living things in a short range.

species.name: Quarren
species.SpecialAbility: Begin with 1 rank of negotiation, Amphibious: can breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalty traveling through water. Ink Spray: Once per encounter as an out of turn incidental may suffer 2 strain to add 1 setback to a combat check made within short range, in water add 3 setback.

species.name: Clawdite
species.SpecialAbility: Begin the game with 1 rank in Resilience, Changeling: as an action may suffer 3 strain and an average resilience check. If success changes apperance to match that of a silhourtte 1 character whom has observed before.

species.name: Devaronian
species.SpecialAbility: start with 1 rank in survival or deception. Resilient Metabolism: Add automatic success to all resilience checks.

species.name: Kalleran
species.SpecialAbility: Kallerans begin with 1 rank of streetwise. Hypersensitive Antennae: begin with Heightened Awareness Talent.
